metadata.Title: CVE-2018-10685 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In Long Range Zip (aka lrzip) 0.631, there is a use-after-free in the lzma_decompress_buf function of stream.c, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-10685` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

lrzip - 0.631+git180517-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: lrzip package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.631+git180517-1').
